DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the strength gains associated with resistance training in a group of 18 male high school athletes consuming either a whey protein supplement or chocolate milk following their exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Strength-enhancing Effect of Whey Protein Supplementation Following Resistance Exercise in Adolescent Males
DOC.criteria: member of Bellarmine Preparatory School boys sports team Must be willing to consume a postexercise beverage allergy to either beverage
